name: Spanish Immersion Preschool Prep classes
description: Spanish Immersion Preschool Prep classes introduce your child to a small group educational setting, allowing them to explore the world and their community in a safe, engaging, and fun environment. Conducted in small groups and low teacher-child ratio (2 teachers for a max. of 8 kids) guarantee your child gets the attention they need at this young age and prepares them for preschool, or TK/K. - Ages: 2 years - 4 years and 6 months old.
